test_message: Prepare execution bundles: 1) Transfer $400 to high-yield savings with 5.2% APY, 2) Cancel Spotify subscription ($9.99/month unused 45 days), 3) Request refund for duplicate Netflix charge $15.99

execution_bundles.description: Transfer $400 to high-yield savings account with 5.2% APY to optimize available funds.
execution_bundles.rollback_plan: Initiate an immediate reversal; move funds back from high-yield savings to original account if transfer fails or is not completed.

execution_bundles.description: Cancel Spotify subscription ($9.99/month) which has been unused for 45 days.
execution_bundles.rollback_plan: Re-subscribe to Spotify immediately if cancellation was in error.

execution_bundles.description: Request a refund for duplicate Netflix charge of $15.99.

payload.subject: Duplicate charge refund request for Netflix subscription
payload.body:
Dear Netflix Support,

I have noticed a duplicate charge of $15.99 on my account. Kindly review and process a refund for the extra charge at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
[Your Name]

execution_bundles.rollback_plan: Follow-up with Netflix support if refund is denied or delayed; no further action necessary if refund is confirmed.

notifications.subject: Action Required: Approve Financial Execution Bundles
notifications.body: Three financial actions (fund transfer, subscription cancellation, duplicate refund) are ready for your approval. Review and approve to proceed.
